name: Street like Madness
description:
This is Work in Progress Rogue like Cyber punk poly style Street Rage Brawler game

still in the early stages but will make alot more updates

would love feed back from you to improve quality of game as this is a pre pre alpha if get alot of feedback it means am onto something good otherwise it might just stay pre pre alpha 

still has loads of bugs and stuff but this was a test to myself i could make a small game and finish it i will keep working on it for a little bit if it gets traction i will keep developing it further

thank you for looking at my game.
